Trade/Device Name(s): SD GlucoNavii Mentor NFC Blood Glucose Monitoring System
SD GlucoNavii Mentor NFC Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): SD GlucoNavii Mentor NFC Blood Glucose Meter
SD GlucoNavii Mentor NFC Multi Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SD GlucoNavii Mentor NFC and NFC Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems utilizing electrochemical biosensor and NFC technology for glucose measurement.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, upper arm, or forearm as an aid in monitoring effectiveness of diabetes control; single-patient use (Mentor NFC) or multi-patient use in professional healthcare settings (Mentor NFC Multi); not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or for use in neonates; enables data transmission to compatible devices via radio frequency communication.
